Japanese:
/p、よくやったね。
あいつら、ナイトシェイドの
偵察隊だよ。
English: Nicely done, /p. Those were part of Night Shade's Reconnaissance Unit.

Japanese:
守りの弱そうな街を探して、
本隊に情報を流してたんだ。
English: They were looking to gather intel about poorly-defended cities for the main force.

Japanese:
これでナイトシェイドを
弱らせてやれたよ。
English: With this, we might have weakened Night Shade a little.

Japanese:
それと、
エリーは病院に運んだよ。
English: Also, Ellie has been taken to hospital.
